meanings.definition: Not receiving payment for work or services.
meanings.sent1: The volunteers at the shelter are nonpaid workers.
meanings.sent2: She offered to do the job nonpaid because she enjoys helping others.
meanings.sent3: The nonpaid position may not bring in money, but it brings a sense of fulfillment.
meanings.sent4: Her nonpaid efforts in the community are like a beacon of kindness.
meanings.sent5: The nonpaid internship provided valuable experience without monetary compensation.

meanings.sent1: The nonpaid internship offered valuable experience for students.
meanings.sent2: He preferred a nonpaid position that allowed him to learn new skills.
meanings.sent3: Choosing a nonpaid job can sometimes lead to unexpected opportunities.
meanings.sent4: Her nonpaid work was rewarded with knowledge and growth.
meanings.sent5: The nonpaid position may not bring in cash, but it brings valuable lessons.

meanings.sent1: She worked nonpaid for the first few months to gain experience.
meanings.sent2: The artist performed nonpaid at the local event to support the community.
meanings.sent3: The nonpaid service they provided was appreciated by all.
meanings.sent4: He generously offered his time nonpaid to help those in need.
meanings.sent5: The team worked tirelessly and nonpaid to achieve their goal.
